text: Eric Kirby (12 October 1926 - May 2018) was an English professional footballer who played as a half-back in the Football League for York City, and was on the books of Sheffield Wednesday without making a league appearance. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Footballers from Sheffield Category:English footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Sheffield Wednesday F.C. players Category:York City F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Eric Kirby
